name: Native WP Cleaner
author: Oleg Komarovskyi

sections.description:
With help of this plugin you can easily disable native wordpress widgets, cleanup your HTML code from such native features as:
– Embeds script;
– EMOJI script and styles;
– RSD link;
– WLW Manifest link;
– Generator meta tag;
Also, you can disable XML-RPC functionality, self ping, enable Honeypot on login page, prevent access to such files as: readme.html, license.txt, xmlrpc.php, wlwmanifest.xml, changelog.txt, etc.
Moreover, you can hide different metaboxes, columns, menu pages, express bar items from administration panel.
Native WP Cleaner – is a handy, lightweight, clean code plugin that will be useful not only for simple blog and website owners, but also for theme developers
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘native-wp-cleaner’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. See new sub-page in ‘Settings’ menu
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload ‘native-wp-cleaner’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. See new sub-page in ‘Settings’ menu

short_description: Disable native widgets, clean head tag from RSS, RSD, WLW Manifest links, disable XML-RPC, cleanup admin panel from columns, metaboxes, menu items.
